text: The Cardinals or Cardinalidae are a family of passerine birds that live in North and South America. == References == * Stiles and Skutch, A guide to the birds of Costa Rica * Hilty, Birds of Venezuela, * ffrench, Birds of Trinidad and Tobago * "National Geographic" Field Guide to the Birds of North America * Klicka, Burns & Spellman. Defining a monophyletic Cardinalidae: a molecular perspective. . p. 36 == Other websites == *Cardinalidae videos on the Internet Bird Collection Category:Passeri
title: Cardinal (bird)
